sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'
import { ChakraProvider, Box, Stack, Text, Image} from '@chakra-ui/react'
import IsiTweet,{Name, UserID, ProfileP} from './IsiTweet';

const TweetInfo = [
    {
        id: "@EdouardMendy",
        name: "Edouard Mendy",
        pp: "https://pbs.twimg.com/profile_images/1311248843439251456/LmWEVVet_400x400.jpg",
        tweet:"dari para rekrutan baru the Blues khususnya untuk tahun ini.",
        time:"10h"
    },
    {
        id: "@thiagosilva",
        name: "Thiago Silva",
        pp: "https://pbs.twimg.com/profile_images/1299361522787864582/5CAtSZzI_400x400.jpg",
        tweet:"orem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipisicing elit, sed do eiusmod tempor incididunt ut labore et dolore magna aliqua. Ut enim ad minim veniam, quis nostrud exercitation ullamco laboris nisi ut aliquip ex ea commodo consequat. Duis aute irure dolor in reprehenderit in voluptate velit esse cillum dolore eu fugiat nulla pariatur. Excepteur sint occaecat cupidatat non proident, sunt in culpa qui officia deserunt mollit anim id est laborum",
        time:"10h"
    },
    {
        id: "@Zouma5",
        name: "Kurt Zouma",
        pp: "https://pbs.twimg.com/profile_images/1313047449657913344/2dErpfsV_400x400.jpg",
        tweet:"Lorem",
        time:"10h"
    },
    {
        id: "@chilly3",
        name: "Ben Chilwell",
        pp: "https://pbs.twimg.com/profile_images/1189684118289887246/TvbH7rsE_400x400.jpg",
        tweet:"Lorem",
        time:"10h"
    },
    {
        id: "@rjames",
        name: "Reece James",
        pp: "https://pbs.twimg.com/profile_images/1344707747284201473/QpnI6RZ4_400x400.jpg",
        tweet:"Lorem",
        time:"10h"
    },
    {
        id: "@ngkante13",
        name: "Ngolo Kante",
        pp: "https://pbs.twimg.com/profile_images/1018823690459508736/2yyZrszu_400x400.jpg",
        tweet:"Lorem",
        time:"10h"
    },
    {
        id: "@masonmount10",
        name: "Mason Mount",
        pp: "https://pbs.twimg.com/profile_images/1327047201214914562/IhkM21jy_400x400.jpg",
        tweet:"Lorem",
        time:"10h"
    },
    {
        id: "@mkocavic",
        name: "Mateo Kovacic",
        pp: "https://pbs.twimg.com/profile_images/1269395572441722887/EZakN5bD_400x400.jpg",
        tweet:"Lorem",
        time:"10h"
    },
    {
        id: "@HZ22",
        name: "Hakim Ziyech",
        pp: "https://pbs.twimg.com/profile_images/1329147701787815940/7gCshclx_400x400.jpg",
        tweet:"Lorem",
        time:"10h"
    },
    {
        id: "@puli10",
        name: "Christian Pulisic",
        pp: "",
        tweet:"Lorem",
        time:"10h"
    },
    {
        id: "@timowerner11",
        name: "Timo Werner",
        pp: "",
        tweet:"Lorem",
        time:"10h"
    }
]

const Tweet = () => {
    const tweetBorderFirst = {
        borderTop: "1px solid #38444D",
        borderBottom: "1px solid #38444D",
        cursor: "pointer"
    };

    const tweetBorder = {
        borderBottom: "1px solid #38444D",
        cursor: "pointer"
    };

    return (
        <ChakraProvider>
            <Box w="600px" minH="110px" style={tweetBorderFirst} ml="-17px" p="2" _hover={{ bg: "#2C3640" }}>
                <Stack direction="row">
                    <Box>
                        <Box w="50px" h="50px" mt="10px"  ml="10px" borderRadius="100%">
                            <Image src="https://logodownload.org/wp-content/uploads/2017/02/chelsea-fc-logo-escudo.png" />
                        </Box>
                    </Box>
                    <Box  minH="90px">
                        <Stack direction="column" mt="10px">
                            <Box>
                                <Stack direction="row">
                                    <Box>
                                        <Text fontSize="15px" fontWeight="bold" color="white">Chelsea FC Indonesia</Text>
                                    </Box>
                                    <Box>
                                        <Text fontSize="15px" color="#8899A6">@chelseafc_indo</Text>
                                    </Box>
                                    <Box>
                                        <Text fontSize="15px" color="#8899A6">15m</Text>
                                    </Box>
                                    <Box>
                                        <Box w="20px" h="10px"  mt="5px" ml="178px">
                                            <Stack direction="row" spacing="2px">
                                                <Box w="5px" h="5px" borderRadius="100%" style={{border :"1px solid #8899A6"}}/>
                                                <Box w="5px" h="5px" borderRadius="100%" style={{border :"1px solid #8899A6"}}/>
                                                <Box w="5px" h="5px" borderRadius="100%" style={{border :"1px solid #8899A6"}}/>
                                            </Stack>
                                        </Box>
                                    </Box>
                                </Stack>
                            </Box>
                            <Box>
                                <IsiTweet tweet="Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipisicing elit, sed do eiusmod tempor incididunt ut labore et dolore magna aliqua. Ut enim ad minim veniam, quis nostrud exercitation ullamco laboris nisi ut aliquip ex ea commodo consequat. Duis aute irure dolor in reprehenderit in voluptate velit esse cillum dolore eu fugiat nulla pariatur. Excepteur sint occaecat cupidatat non proident, sunt in culpa qui officia deserunt mollit anim id est laborum" />
                            </Box>
                            <Box>
                                <Stack direction="row" spacing="70px" mt="10px" mb="10px">
                                    <Box>
                                        <Stack direction="row" spacing="15px">
                                            <Box w="20px" h="20px">
                                                <Image src="./Img Tweet/Comment.png" />
                                            </Box>
                                            <Box w="20px" h="20px">
                                                <Text fontSize="13px" color="#8899A6">10</Text>
                                            </Box>
                                        </Stack>
                                    </Box>
                                    <Box>
                                        <Stack direction="row" spacing="15px">
                                            <Box >
                                                <Image src="./Img Tweet/Retweet.png" h="16px"/>
                                            </Box>
                                            <Box w="20px" h="20px">
                                                <Text fontSize="13px" color="#8899A6">10</Text>
                                            </Box>
                                        </Stack>
                                    </Box>
                                    <Box>
                                        <Stack direction="row" spacing="15px">
                                            <Box w="20px" h="20px">
                                                <Image src="./Img Tweet/Like.png" />
                                            </Box>
                                            <Box w="20px" h="20px">
                                                <Text fontSize="13px" color="#8899A6">10</Text>
                                            </Box>
                                        </Stack>
                                    </Box>
                                    <Box>
                                        <Stack direction="row" spacing="15px">
                                            <Box w="20px" h="20px">
                                                <Image src="./Img Tweet/Share.png" />
                                            </Box>
                                            <Box w="20px" h="20px">
                                                <Text fontSize="13px" color="#8899A6">10</Text>
                                            </Box>
                                        </Stack>
                                    </Box>
                                </Stack>
                            </Box>
                        </Stack>
                    </Box>
                </Stack>
            </Box>

            {TweetInfo.map(Twitter => {
                const {id, name, tweet, pp} = Twitter;
                return(
                    <Box w="600px" minH="110px" style={tweetBorder} ml="-17px" p="2" _hover={{ bg: "#2C3640" }} _hover={{ bg: "#2C3640" }}>
                    <Stack direction="row">
                        <Box>
                            <ProfileP pp={pp} w="50px" h="50px" mt="10px"  ml="10px" borderRadius="100%"/>
                        </Box>
                        <Box  minH="90px">
                            <Stack direction="column" mt="10px">
                                <Box>
                                    <Stack direction="row">
                                        <Box>
                                            <Name name={name} />
                                        </Box>
                                        <Box>
                                            <UserID id={id} />
                                        </Box>
                                        <Box>
                                            <Text fontSize="15px" color="#8899A6">15m</Text>
                                        </Box>
                                    </Stack>
                                </Box>
                                <Box>
                                    <IsiTweet tweet={tweet} />
                                </Box>
                                <Box>
                                    <Stack direction="row" spacing="70px" mt="10px" mb="10px">
                                        <Box>
                                            <Stack direction="row" spacing="15px">
                                                <Box w="20px" h="20px">
                                                    <Image src="./Img Tweet/Comment.png" />
                                                </Box>
                                                <Box w="20px" h="20px">
                                                    <Text fontSize="13px" color="#8899A6">10</Text>
                                                </Box>
                                            </Stack>
                                        </Box>
                                        <Box>
                                            <Stack direction="row" spacing="15px">
                                                <Box >
                                                    <Image src="./Img Tweet/Retweet.png" h="16px"/>
                                                </Box>
                                                <Box w="20px" h="20px">
                                                    <Text fontSize="13px" color="#8899A6">10</Text>
                                                </Box>
                                            </Stack>
                                        </Box>
                                        <Box>
                                            <Stack direction="row" spacing="15px">
                                                <Box w="20px" h="20px">
                                                    <Image src="./Img Tweet/Like.png" />
                                                </Box>
                                                <Box w="20px" h="20px">
                                                    <Text fontSize="13px" color="#8899A6">10</Text>
                                                </Box>
                                            </Stack>
                                        </Box>
                                        <Box>
                                            <Stack direction="row" spacing="15px">
                                                <Box w="20px" h="20px">
                                                    <Image src="./Img Tweet/Share.png" />
                                                </Box>
                                                <Box w="20px" h="20px">
                                                    <Text fontSize="13px" color="#8899A6">10</Text>
                                                </Box>
                                            </Stack>
                                        </Box>
                                    </Stack>
                                </Box>
                            </Stack>
                        </Box>
                    </Stack>
                </Box>
                )
            })}

        </ChakraProvider>
    )
}

export default Tweet
